title: Getting Started
description: Press your mind gracefully, which is powered by nuxt.js 3.0 and nuxt.js content 2.0.

children.value: Press your mind gracefully, which is powered by nuxt.js 3.0 and nuxt.js content 2.0.
Make sure to install the dependencies:

props.code:
# yarn
yarn install

# npm
npm install

# pnpm
pnpm install --shamefully-hoist

children.value:

npm install

# pnpm
